sentences: Erik Wøllo (born 1961) is a Norwegian composer and musician, guitarist and synthesist.
In those years in the early eighties the studio technology was new and revolutionary, and I wanted to explore all the new possibilities.
Also for the last decades, I have been able to bring this my musical concept to the stage, performing live.
As well as two download live albums "Silent Currents 3" (2013), and "Star’s End 2015" (Silent Currents 4).
In August 2019, I performed a main act concert with special written music for an outdoor festival in Norway, featuring Trey Gunn, Kouame Sereba and Jerry Marotta."
One of the areas Wøllo has been deeply exploring for many decades, is the connections between the various art forms.
Erik Wøllo currently lives on Hvaler, an island in the south of Norway.
Wøllo with Fender Stratocaster at Schallwelle 2012.
2014 - Ian Boddy/Erik Wøllo - "EC-12" (Live in Germany 2012, DiN, Digital)
2010 - Kouame Sereba with Erik Wøllo - "Bako" (Etnisk Musikklubb, CD)
2009 - Frank Van Bogaert with Erik Wøllo - "Air Machine" (Ace Studio Editions, CD)
2009 - Steve Roach/Erik Wøllo - "Stream of Thought" (Projekt, CD)
2001 - Erik Wøllo/Hyperlinkto - "Musikk til en Meny" (Monumental/Hyperlinkto, CD)
1984 - Wiese/Wøllo/Waring - "Trio" (Maza Rec, LP-1984/Curling Legs, CD-2008)Several selected compositions licensed for Collection Albums:
